s_synopsis: In a day, Thunder was playing ball near the house when suddenly a loud explosion was heard, so powerful that it destroyed the windows of the family home and dropped the trees nearby. "Mom! Dad!" Thunder screamed alarmed. He ran home, but found nobody there. He found only a letter lying on the ground, in which it was written that his parents had been kidnapped. The brave Thunder decided to save his parents and find the culprit.
